name: Super Nexus (Beta Version)
description:
Super Nexus is a platformer video game based on theories on gamified learning and social cognition. It utilizes familiar retro game elements with addition of signages, videos, and animation scenes based on the RUN-JUMP-READ-WATCH model to engage elementary-aged children in learning COVID-19 information from WHO and DOH. Let's fight the infodemic together!

Super Nexus Teaching Guide:https://docs.google.com/document/d/13dOA2s5AJv3LMTWToPvEpu6LBsrZC9_t9T_hYG7g9Pw/...
